participant_1.background:
Baking is my passion, and I have a soft spot for dogs.
my favorite writer is nicholas sparks.
i love to drink whiskey.
i live alone.
I am always looking for ways to help others, and my birthday was a time for reflection and hope.

participant_2.background:
I am a young woman who enjoys being independent and having my own secrets.
Before my current job I was a dog trainer.
I love the mild weather in Portland.
i have a wife and two kids.
I wash my clothes when they start to stink from all the road trips.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
Oh cool! I love dogs! What's your favorite breed?
I love all dogs! But I think I have a soft spot for golden retrievers. They're so sweet and friendly.
I love golden retrievers too! They're the perfect family dog.
I agree! I have a golden retriever named Buddy and he's the best dog ever.
I'm sure he is! I've always wanted a dog, but I live in an apartment and I don't think I could give one the space it needs.
That's too bad! But you could always volunteer at a local animal shelter. That's a great way to get your dog fix without having to commit to owning one.
That's a good idea! I'll have to look into that.
It's a lot of fun! And it's a great way to help out the animals.
Thanks for the suggestion! I really appreciate it.
